message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $10,000 to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I would like to propose a price of $8,500. This feels more aligned with my valuation of the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not comfortable with $8,500.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This price is still very fair, considering what the product is worth to you. Let's try to reach a middle ground.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $8,750. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
